title: Trait Objects for Heterogeneous Values
description: In this lab, we will explore how to use trait objects to allow for values of different types in a library, specifically in the context of a graphical user interface (GUI) tool.

meta.description: Explore how to use trait objects to allow for values of different types in a Rust library, specifically in the context of a graphical user interface (GUI) tool.
